entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: FyTube - YouTube Without Ads
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

Application Description

Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and allows you to play any video. FyTube has special features such as: playback with the screen locked, as well as other well-known features like: activating subtitles, changing playback speed, full-screen mode, rewinding‚Ä¶ we also added search filters by upload date so you don‚Äôt miss a single video of the topics you love the most! SPECIAL FEATURES PLAYBACK WITH LOCKED SCREEN: This feature allows you to keep listening to the audio of your videos while your device‚Äôs screen is locked, ideal for listening to music or your favorite songs while driving, or when you just want to relax with the audio in the background. How to activate: Simply lock your device‚Äôs screen and you‚Äôll see your player use Play, continuing to listen to the audio of your video without interruption :) Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube BASIC FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Full-screen video playback with high-quality videos. ‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use interface, friendly design. ‚Ä¢ Fast forward and rewind your video whenever you want, never miss the most interesting parts. ‚Ä¢ Subtitle activation. ‚Ä¢ Change playback speed to your liking. ‚Ä¢ Search engine with smart filters by upload date: day, week, month, year, all. ‚Ä¢ In each video, you‚Äôll find a related videos section to discover more interesting content. ‚Ä¢ Discover the latest videos and don‚Äôt miss the latest news from around the world. ‚Ä¢ Our app connects directly to YouTube, allowing you to find any video. ‚Ä¢ Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device. ‚Ä¢ VoiceOver available. ‚Ä¢ No user creation required. ‚Ä¢ We don‚Äôt store cache, cookies, or personal data without your authorization, watch your favorite videos safely. ‚Ä¢ Interface available in 29 languages. ‚Ä¢ NO ADS INTERRUPTIONS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS. Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new ad-free, subscription-free video streaming experience. Minimum requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 13 or higher. ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher. Privacy Policy: https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube Terms of Service: https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube Words related to our application: youtube, youtobe,youtube youtube music,youtube vanced,youtube ad blocker,no subscription, skip youtube ads, music without ad, music no ads, no ads, app youtube, youtube adblocker, without ads,without ads,block popups,ads remover,pop up blocker,ad-block,blocking ads,adblock for youtube,content blocker,ad blockers,ad blocking,ad blocker,been choice,adblocker,ad-blocker,ad block plus,adblock pro,ad free,block ads,adblock browser,Adblock,ad blocker plus,skip youtube,ads,youtube singing,sin anuncios,music without ad,free you tube red,youtube adblocker,ad skip,block ad,free youtube,video-ads,adblocker youtube,abblocker,stop ads If you have any questions on how to use FyTube, visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us, we‚Äôll be happy to assist you, we answer all our emails: fytube@fydub.com FyTube works with YouTube. The YouTube brand and logo are registered trademarks of Google, Inc. All rights reserved. ¬© FyTube¬Æ.

entry.title: Inspire Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$19.99 ‚Üí $7.99 Ôºâ

Application Description

Available exclusively on the App Store, meticulously designed to be beautifully powerful, and painstakingly engineered for iPad ‚Äî Inspire Pro delivers an incredibly fast and realistic painting, drawing, and sketching experience that you can take with you wherever you go and use whenever inspiration strikes. Our proprietary painting engine Sorcery‚Ñ¢ takes full advantage of the GPU to render brush strokes with brilliant 64-bit color, laser-sharp sub-pixel precision, and insanely fast speed. While the strokes of a wet oil paint brush look beautiful on their own, the breathtaking blending effects of a dry brush will absolutely stun you. Graze the canvas with just a bit of pressure to add a subtle blur to your artwork or use stronger pressure to actually mix existing colors on the canvas together to create new ones. Whether you are a budding artist, seasoned professional, or somewhere in-between, you will enjoy the simplicity and power of the most intuitive and compelling illustration app for iPad, Inspire Pro. Amazing Brushes ‚Ä¢ 150 high quality brushes to choose from, divided into 15 sets: Oil Paint, Airbrushes, Spray Paint, Paint Splatter, Graphite Pencils, Wax Crayons, Markers, Chalk, Charcoal, Pastels & Cont√©, Basic Shapes, Complex Shapes, Shape Outlines, Patterns, and Textures ‚Ä¢ All brushes can be used as a Wet Brush, Dry Brush (Blending), or Eraser ‚Ä¢ Over 20 different settings are available to customize brush strokes with powerful versatility and variation The Best Painting App for iPad ‚Ä¢ Sorcery‚Ñ¢, the fastest 64-bit painting engine on the App Store ‚Ä¢ Full-fledged Apple Pencil support for pressure, tilt angle, orientation, and double-tap ‚Ä¢ Smart Keyboard support with over 20 context-sensitive keyboard shortcuts ‚Ä¢ Create a canvas of any size up to 16K (64MP) on iPad Pro ‚Ä¢ Dual-texture brushes ‚Ä¢ 64-bit color ‚Ä¢ All device orientations are supported all the time ‚Äî switch from portrait to landscape painting with ease ‚Ä¢ 1000 levels of undo and redo are available ‚Ä¢ Touch and slide hotspots can be used to quickly change brush size, opacity, and pressure without opening a menu ‚Ä¢ The eyedropper tool can be used with a touch and hold gesture to select paint colors from the canvas ‚Ä¢ The canvas can be moved around, rotated, and zoomed in and out up to 6400% Canvas Playback Video Recording ‚Ä¢ Brush strokes are automatically recorded as you paint without any delay ‚Ä¢ You can play the video of your artwork being created stroke-by-stroke directly in the gallery ‚Ä¢ Exported videos are high quality HD at up to 1080p resolution Full-Featured Color Picker ‚Ä¢ Choose any paint color you can dream of with the intuitive color picker ‚Ä¢ HSB and RGB sliders accompany a large color circle, color square, and opacity slider ‚Ä¢ Your latest colors are saved to a palette automatically while you paint ‚Ä¢ You can also save your favorite colors to a palette with drag and drop Visit snowCanoe.com to check out more screenshots, videos, and artwork.

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Phone Drive: File Storage Sync
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí Free Ôºâ

Application Description

Introducing Phone Drive - File Manager: Transform your iOS device into a portable Wireless Flash Drive. With Phone Drive, you can effortlessly store, view, and manage local or cloud files on your iPhone or iPad. Seamlessly connect to Phone Drive from any Mac or PC over a WiFi network and transfer files through simple drag and drop from Web Browser, Finder or Windows Explorer. Experience the convenience of managing multiple cloud accounts in a single application. Download, upload, view, and even stream videos or music directly from your cloud drives. Phone Drive boasts a comprehensive set of features including a document viewer, PDF reader, music player, image viewer, voice recorder, text editor, file manager, and support for various file operations such as delete, move, copy, email, share, zip, unzip, and more. *** KEY FEATURES *** ‚Ä¢ SUPPORT CLOUD STORAGE: Connect to multiple Dropbox, OneDrive, Box Drive, FTP, WebDAV, Yandex Disk, and iCloud Drive storage accounts. (*additional in-app purchase required) ‚Ä¢ MULTIMEDIA PLAYER: Create custom audio playlists with options like repeat, shuffle, background playback, and multitask remote control. Stream videos and music directly from your cloud storage. ‚Ä¢ DOCUMENT READER: View MS Office, iWork, Text, and HTML files with ease. ‚Ä¢ FILE OPERATION: Effortlessly move, copy, rename, delete, zip, unzip, unrar, create files, and folders. ‚Ä¢ FILE SHARING: Share files with other iPhone/iPad devices via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi, with automatic search for nearby available devices. ‚Ä¢ EASY FILE UPLOAD: Conveniently upload files through drag and drop via your PC/Mac web browser or USB using iTunes. ‚Ä¢ TEXT EDITOR: Edit text files and source codes directly on your iOS device with the built-in text editor. ‚Ä¢ IMPORT/ FILES CREATION: Create text files, capture images, record videos or voice memos, and import pictures from your photo library. ‚Ä¢¬†ÔªøPASSCODE LOCK: Protect your files from unauthorized access. Utilize Touch ID and Face ID support for secure unlocking. ‚Ä¢ UNIVERSALITY: Enjoy the benefits of this app on both iPhone and iPad with a single purchase. *** AUDIO PLAYER *** ‚Ä¢ Play MP3 files as playlists. ‚Ä¢ Repeat and shuffle songs. ‚Ä¢ Background audio playback. ‚Ä¢ Multitask audio remote control. ‚Ä¢ Stream music from cloud storage. *** VIEWABLE FORMATS *** Phone Drive supports the following formats: ‚Ä¢ Audio (WAV, MP3, M4A, CAF, AIF, AIFF, AAC) ‚Ä¢ Images (JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP, TIF, TIFF, ICO) ‚Ä¢ Movies (MP4, MOV, MPV, M4V) ‚Ä¢ iWorks (Pages, numbers, and Keynote) ‚Ä¢ Microsoft Office (Word, Excel and PowerPoint) ‚Ä¢ RTF (Rich Text Format) ‚Ä¢ RTFD (TextEdit with embedded images) ‚Ä¢ PDF Documents ‚Ä¢ Plain text ‚Ä¢ Source code ‚Ä¢ HTML web pages ‚Ä¢ Web archives Explore more about Phone Drive at: Website : https://sixbytes.io Twitter: https://twitter.com/SixbytesApp Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sixbytesapp For detailed information, please review our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: ‚Ä¢ Terms of service: https://sixbytes.io/assets/terms-of-service.pdf ‚Ä¢ Privacy policy: https://sixbytes.io/assets/privacy-policy.pdf
